Review comments addressed and changes pushed in.

I noticed you have updated SimpleEvnetHandler, tah tis good. If you can add a handler which implements  IObserver<ICompletedTask> and add set it to REEF.Driver.DriverConfiguration.OnTaskCompleted in AllHandlers, that would make the example more complete.

Closing this, as it has fallen out of merge-ability. Also, I just lost the one machine this worked on and have to re-install it. We'll try again another time.

[Reef-pull-request-ubuntu #608](https://builds.apache.org/job/Reef-pull-request-ubuntu/608/) SUCCESS
This pull request looks good

A side note: Reading the code made me wonder whether the schemas introduced here deserve some more attention. For example: Would it make sense for us to use them also in the Bridge? Or maybe a way to retire our protobuf based wire protocols between Client, Driver and Evaluator? If we want to go down that path with a unified set of schemas, it might make sense to move them into their own project, shared between C# and Java.

Anyway, this looks good and should go in once @afchung's comments have been addressed.

I will test and merge

Test RunSimpleEventHandlerOnLocalRuntime failed at:

EXIT: 9/29/2015 8:36:27 PM ClrSystemHandlerWrapper::Call_ClrSystemCompletedTask_OnNext. Duration: [00:00:00.0041098].
<C++>InteropUtil Error: 0 : 2015-09-29T20:36:27.2190837-07:00 0003
ERROR: Exception in Call_ClrSystemCompletedTask_OnNextencountered error [System.ArgumentNullException: Array cannot be null.
Parameter name: bytes
   at System.Text.Encoding.GetString(Byte[] bytes)
   at Org.Apache.REEF.Utilities.ByteUtilities.ByteArrarysToString(Byte[] b)
   at Org.Apache.REEF.Tests.Functional.Bridge.HelloSimpleEventHandlers.OnNext(ICompletedTask value)
   at Org.Apache.REEF.Driver.Bridge.ClrSystemHandler`1.OnNext(T value)
   at Org.Apache.REEF.Driver.Bridge.ClrSystemHandlerWrapper.Call_ClrSystemCompletedTask_OnNext(UInt64 handle, ICompletedTaskClr2Java clr2Java)
   at Java_org_apache_reef_javabridge_NativeInterop_clrSystemCompletedTaskHandlerOnNext(JNIEnv_* env, _jclass* cls, Int64 handler, _jobject* jcompletedTask, _jobject* jlogger)] with mesage [Array cannot be null.
Parameter name: bytes] and stack trace [   at System.Text.Encoding.GetString(Byte[] bytes)
   at Org.Apache.REEF.Utilities.ByteUtilities.ByteArrarysToString(Byte[] b)
   at Org.Apache.REEF.Tests.Functional.Bridge.HelloSimpleEventHandlers.OnNext(ICompletedTask value)
   at Org.Apache.REEF.Driver.Bridge.ClrSystemHandler`1.OnNext(T value)
   at Org.Apache.REEF.Driver.Bridge.ClrSystemHandlerWrapper.Call_ClrSystemCompletedTask_OnNext(UInt64 handle, ICompletedTaskClr2Java clr2Java)
   at Java_org_apache_reef_javabridge_NativeInterop_clrSystemCompletedTaskHandlerOnNext(JNIEnv_\* env, _jclass\* cls, Int64 handler, _jobject\* jcompletedTask, _jobject\* jlogger)]
@markusweimer  I have done another pass incorporating review and some discussions.
